text:
I Love New York, seen visually as, "I "❤" NY" was a design concept created by Milton Glaser in 1977. The song "I Love New York" also the state song of New York. The logo was created by Milton Glaser.
Lyrics.
It's greater than place and show.
You know, New York is different!
'Cause there's no place else on earth quite like New York!
It's greater than place and show.
You know, New York is different!
'Cause there's no place else on earth quite like New York!
